articles.title: CBN Reduces Policy Rate to 17.25% in First 2026 Meeting
articles.summary: The Central Bank of Nigeria has lowered the Monetary Policy Rate to 17.25% in its January 2026 meeting, marking the first rate cut of the year.

articles.title: Inflation Rate Falls to 17.8% in January 2026
articles.summary: Nigeria's inflation rate dropped to 17.8% in January 2026, continuing the downward trend that began in late 2025 according to NBS data.

articles.title: Naira Strengthens to ₦820/$ in Parallel Market - January 2026
articles.summary: The Nigerian naira has strengthened to ₦820 per US dollar in the parallel market, showing improved forex liquidity in early 2026.

articles.title: GDP Growth Projected at 3.2% for 2026 - IMF Report
